desc: This book is an anthology of effective database management techniques representing the collective wisdom of the OakTable Network. With an emphasis upon performance―but also branching into security, national language, and other issues―the book helps you deliver the most value for your company’s investment in Oracle Database technologies. You’ll learn to effectively plan for and monitor performance, to troubleshoot systematically when things go wrong, and to manage your database rather than letting it manage you.

details.authors: Pete Finnigan, Alex Gorbachev, Randolf Geist, Connie Green, Charles Hooper, Jonathan Lewis, Niall Litchfield, Robyn Sands, Joze Senegacnik, Uri Shaft, Riyaj Shamsudeen, Jeremiah Wilton, Graham Wood

title: Expert Oracle Practices: Oracle Database Administration from the Oak Table (Expert’s Voice in Oracle)
